pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spherogram is a Python module for dealing with the kind of planardiagrams that arise in 3-dimensional topology, such as link andHeegaard diagrams. It a component of the larger`SnapPy <https://snappy.computop.org>`_ project. For some basicexamples of using Spherogram to build links, `see here <https://snappy.computop.org/spherogram.html>`_. You canbrowse the `source code <https://github.com/3-manifolds/Spherogram>`_.
